<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73568</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4107ec98-abdd-46cc-a85c-252fa9dc9d1e#1#8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az elektromos megosztás</string>
            <string language="en">Electrical splitting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrische Verbindungsaufspaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se dédoubler électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rachar elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spaccare elettrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικός διαχωρισμός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El partir eléctrico</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Töltések eloszlása vezetők felületén, elektromos megosztás, árnyékolás, csúcshatás</string>
            <string language="en">Distribution of charges on the beneath of conductors, electric spitting, shadowing, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">elektromos megosztás,  árnyékolás,  csúcshatás,  villámhárító,  </string>
            <string language="en">electric sharing, shadowing, peak impact, lightning-conductor,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verteilung der Ladungen auf unten der Leiter, 
elektrisches Spratzen, beschattend, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution des frais sur dessous des 
conducteurs, crachement électrique, ombrageant, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição das cargas no abaixo dos 
condutores, spitting elétrico, sombreando, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione delle spese sul sotto dei conduttori,
emissione elettrica, ombreggiante, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή των δαπανών κάτω των αγωγών, ηλεκτρικό 
spitting, που σκιάζουν, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distribución de cargas en debajo de los 
conductores, expectoración eléctrica, sombreando, peakimpact</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisches Teilen, beschattend, Höchstauswirkung, 
Blitz-Leiter,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">partage électrique, ombrageant, impact maximal, 
foudre-conducteur,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compartilhar elétrico, sombreando, impacto peak, 
relâmpago-condutor,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">compartecipazione elettrica, ombreggiando, effetto peak, 
lampo-conduttore,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική διανομή, σκιάζοντας, μέγιστος αντίκτυπος, 
αστραπή-αγωγός,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el compartir eléctrico, sombreando, impacto máximo, 
rela'mpago-conductor,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
